fr:mainmatter.fr:p: There is a natural bijection between maps g : Y \to \mathchoice {\textstyle \sum _{{\mathopen {}\left (x : A\right )\mathclose {}}}}{\textstyle \sum _{{\mathopen {}\left (x : A\right )\mathclose {}}}}{\scriptstyle \sum _{{\mathopen {}\left (x : A\right )\mathclose {}}}}{\scriptscriptstyle \sum _{{\mathopen {}\left (x : A\right )\mathclose {}}}}(B(x) \to X) and pairs of maps (g_1 : Y \to A, g_2 : Y\mathbin {\times _{A}}B \to X).
